definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The city is noted for its handicrafts. Population, 745,000.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以手工艺品著名。

sentences.english: This carpet is hand-made by traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 这是传统工艺手工编织的地毯。

sentences.english: This leaves time in each task for the manual delivery of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 这为每个任务留下了手工交付书面文档的时间。

sentences.english: He is very clever with his hands and can make beautiful origami .
sentences.chinese: 他的手很巧，能做很漂亮的折纸手工。

sentences.english: Handcrafted in the U. S. A with 100% lead-free pewter.
sentences.chinese: 美国手工制作，材质为100%无铅白镴。

sentences.english: Speaking of handicrafts, in addition to the dirndl.
sentences.chinese: 说到手工艺品，除了紧腰宽裙之外。

sentences.english: If fruit is to be bagged it is either bagged by machine or by hand.
sentences.chinese: 若需袋装，包装可以手工或机器方式进行。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the traditional crafts of bamboo hat has endangered lost.
sentences.chinese: 花竹帽这项传统手工艺如今濒临失传。

sentences.english: Yes, China has some good luthiers making handmade concert quality guitars.
sentences.chinese: 是的，中国现在有很多好琴师在制作手工演奏会琴。

sentences.english: China Baoji folk handicraft, Papercut, Characters series, Four blessing has descended upon the house, handicraftsman created.
sentences.chinese: 宝鸡手工剪纸，文字系列，四喜临门，手工艺人创作。

sentences.english: China Baoji folk handicraft, Papercut, Characters series, Four blessing has descended upon the house, handicraftsman created.
sentences.chinese: 宝鸡手工剪纸，文字系列，四喜临门，手工艺人创作。

sentences.english: So is that your project for school?
sentences.chinese: 这是你学校的手工课作业？

sentences.english: Left, however, hoping go back to the place with you I am dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 纯手工翻译，希望能表达你的心意。

sentences.english: The owner-peasants and the master handicraftsmen are both engaged in small-scale production.
sentences.chinese: 自耕农和手工业主所经营的，都是小生产的经济。

sentences.english: Handmade Christmas ornaments made for the fans of Angry Birds.
sentences.chinese: 手工制成的圣诞树小挂件，小鸟迷们有福啦。

sentences.english: Microscopical analysis is one of the most versatile techniques in the hands of trained operators.
sentences.chinese: 显微分析是有训练的手工操作方面最普通的技术之一。

definition: to cure by drying over a fire (tea, meat etc)/to bake
